item.title: Theta
item.description: Theta is my toy programming language, with roots coming from Lox of Crafting Interpreters fame, Java, and Rust. It’s designed to be a starting place for further exploration of programming language concepts I didn’t learn in college. Features Bytecode compiler and interpreter for basic expressions Support for statements Block support Static typing Stack frames Function support Array support Upcoming Features Structure / Object support Interface or traits? Generics Unified heap (arena support / raw pointers in Rust) Garbage collection (Z1 / Shenanoah based) A simple standard library Optimization passes SSF, etc Debug tooling JIT compilation Hot code detection
